		<h1 style="font-size:50px;line-height:1.2;" class="wp-block-site-title">Five for the Future</h1>

		
		<p class="has-white-color has-text-color" style="line-height:2.3">Commit to the future of WordPress and the open web.</p>
		
	
	</div>

<main class="wp-block-group entry-content is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-22 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">

<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-white-color has-charcoal-1-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-elements-63bba11f4a1b9b45c3806275f6d97e66 is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-4 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space)">
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-hero-section is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-1 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center is-layout-flow wp-container-core-column-is-layout-1 wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">
<p class="is-style-wporg-tldr is-style-short-text has-extra-large-font-size">The Five for the Future program allows organizations to contribute resources to support the sustained growth of the WordPress project, ensuring the longevity of WordPress and open source while investing in their own success.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img decoding="async" width="1024" height="653" src="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/5ftf-header-graphic-1024x653.png" alt="" class="wp-image-66893" srcset="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/5ftf-header-graphic-1024x653.png 1024w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/5ftf-header-graphic-300x191.png 300w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/5ftf-header-graphic-768x490.png 768w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/5ftf-header-graphic.png 1280w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide is-content-justification-left is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-5 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">Take your seat at the table</h2>



<p>Organizations that participate in Five for the Future play a key role in shaping the future of WordPress. Your contributions can translate that effort into a direct and meaningful impact on your business and beyond. Explore the <a href="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/handbook/">Five for the Future handbook</a> to learn more about the program.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-2 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img decoding="async" width="168" height="224" src="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/compass-x4.png" alt="" class="wp-image-66895" style="width:42px" /></figure>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-inter-font-family has-normal-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:600">Gain a strategic advantage</h2>



<p>Sync your business objectives with WordPress’s development to stay current with platform trends, and get early insight into WordPress releases to inform your product decisions.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="112" height="112" src="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/group.png" alt="" class="wp-image-66896" style="width:56px" /></figure>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-inter-font-family has-normal-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:600">Recruit and develop top talent</h2>



<p>Connect with a global network of professionals who already contribute to open source. By sponsoring their contributions, you’ll also provide existing teams with cost-effective, hands-on professional development opportunities.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="221" height="224" src="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/megaphone-x4.png" alt="" class="wp-image-66897" style="width:55px" /></figure>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-inter-font-family has-normal-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:600">Represent your and your client’s needs</h2>



<p>Represent your customers’ or clients’ perspectives within the WordPress community. As you contribute and provide expertise, you’ll gain the recognition to influence key decisions.</p>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-light-grey-2-background-color has-background is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-6 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space)">
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-3 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:45%">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" width="1024" height="954" src="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia-1024x954.webp" alt="" class="wp-image-66882" srcset="https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia-1024x954.webp 1024w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia-300x280.webp 300w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia-768x716.webp 768w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia-215x200.webp 215w, https://wordpress.org/five-for-the-future/files/2024/09/wordcamp-asia.webp 1200w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" /></figure>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="margin-top:0">Extend your expertise across WordPress</h2>



<p>The WordPress project is uniquely set up to benefit from contributing teams across all disciplines. Along with development and technical expertise, here are some other focus areas your organization can contribute to:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Community building and management</li>



<li>Documentation</li>



<li>Translation and localization</li>



<li>Training and education</li>



<li>Testing and QA</li>
</ul>



<p>Discover all the <a href="https://make.wordpress.org">contributing teams</a> your company can get involved with as a Five for the Future participant.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-white-color has-blueberry-1-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-elements-d0d134d4a0d326f6c74c1c7296ff80c3 is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-7 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--edge-space)">

		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),

			skipLinkTargetID,

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';

		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerHTML = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );

readabilityObject.title: Five for the Future
readabilityObject.content:
Commit to the future of WordPress and the open web.

The Five for the Future program allows organizations to contribute resources to support the sustained growth of the WordPress project, ensuring the longevity of WordPress and open source while investing in their own success.

Take your seat at the table

Organizations that participate in Five for the Future play a key role in shaping the future of WordPress. Your contributions can translate that effort into a direct and meaningful impact on your business and beyond. Explore the Five for the Future handbook to learn more about the program.

Gain a strategic advantage

Sync your business objectives with WordPress’s development to stay current with platform trends, and get early insight into WordPress releases to inform your product decisions.

Recruit and develop top talent

Connect with a global network of professionals who already contribute to open source. By sponsoring their contributions, you’ll also provide existing teams with cost-effective, hands-on professional development opportunities.

Represent your and your client’s needs

Represent your customers’ or clients’ perspectives within the WordPress community. As you contribute and provide expertise, you’ll gain the recognition to influence key decisions.

Extend your expertise across WordPress

The WordPress project is uniquely set up to benefit from contributing teams across all disciplines. Along with development and technical expertise, here are some other focus areas your organization can contribute to:

  • Community building and management
  • Documentation
  • Translation and localization
  • Training and education
  • Testing and QA

Discover all the contributing teams your company can get involved with as a Five for the Future participant.

Contributor experiences

See all testimonials

Milana Cap

Sponsored by XWP

Milana Cap has been serving as a co-representative for the Documentation team since 2021. Driven by her advocacy for WordPress education.

Carolina Nymark

Sponsored by Yoast

Carolina Nymark is a developer and educator focusing on the block editor and themes. She is a bundled theme component maintainer and was the development lead for the default Twenty Twenty-One theme

Nadia Maya Ardiani

Sponsored by Hostinger

Nadia Maya Ardiani has contributed to the Training and Polyglots team, currently serving as the Indonesian Translation Coordinator for the Training team.
